name: Midnight Market (itch)
description:
Controls

Click or press enter to advance story text

Click on a drawer or bottle to get the ingredient out of it. 

Drag ingredients to the mortar to add them to the current potion.

Click on the recipe cards to view recipes. Press ESC to go back to crafting.

Click the mortar to blend your potion.

Press space to clear a cluttered workspace, and tab to empty the mortar.
